message: Multiple "Coming Soon" features in Admin More screen - Settings, Analytics, and Notifications are all placeholder stubs that show "coming soon" dialog

data.current_behavior: All three features show _comingSoon() dialog instead of actual implementation
data.impact: Admin cannot configure company settings, view analytics, or manage notifications

message: Multiple NotImplemented features in BookingDetailsScreen - Edit booking, Reschedule, Print, Share, View History, Delete Booking, and Generate Invoice all show placeholder dialogs

data.impact: Admin cannot edit/reschedule bookings, delete bookings, generate invoices, or perform common administrative actions

message: Admin RPC integration is partially complete - 3 RPC use cases implemented (assign_employee, cancel_booking_as_admin, update_service), but schedule conflict handling in assign_employee may need enhancement

implemented_rpcs.potential_issue: Line 159: Schedule conflict parsing returns empty conflict list - conflicts from error details not being parsed

implemented_rpcs.status: Exists but not examined in detail

ui_integration.employee_selection_modal.dart: Fully integrated with assign_employee RPC, includes conflict dialog

message: Priority implementation order for Admin features: 1) Reschedule booking (critical for operations), 2) Edit booking details, 3) Generate invoices, 4) Delete bookings, 5) Settings/Analytics/Notifications

priority_1_critical: Reschedule booking - needed for handling scheduling conflicts and customer requests
Edit booking - needed to update service details, address, notes
priority_2_high: Generate Invoice - needed for completed bookings and payment tracking
Delete booking - needed for cleanup of test/invalid bookings
data.implementation_notes: Consider creating RPC functions: reschedule_booking(booking_id, new_datetime), update_booking_details(booking_id, updates), generate_invoice(booking_id), delete_booking(booking_id)

message: Admin Dashboard and Bookings screens are well-implemented with proper filtering, realtime updates, and professional UI - these are production-ready components

well_implemented_screens: admin_dashboard_screen.dart - Statistics cards, quick actions, navigation
admin_bookings_screen.dart - Booking list with status filtering, realtime updates
booking_details_screen.dart - Comprehensive booking view with all data sections
employee_selection_modal.dart - Employee assignment with specialization filtering
positive_aspects: Proper use of Riverpod providers and AsyncValue
Realtime provider integration for live updates
Professional gradient UI with Voltzy brand colors
Comprehensive error handling and loading states
RPC integration for assign_employee and cancel_booking_as_admin
Schedule conflict detection and override capability
data.architecture_quality: High - follows Flutter best practices, proper state management, clean widget composition
